headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Vehicle Exhibitionist
content:
You can now show off your Personal Vehicleâ€™s tricked out engine block, detailed interiors and more with complete control of your vehicle doors.

Access the Vehicle Doors option from the Interaction Menu to manually open and close every door on your vehicle, either while driving your ride or when standing nearby. Get out there and publicly flash that new engine block or tricked out trunk.

You can even turn on your neons and your favorite radio station while outside your car.
